name: analyze_page_tool
description: Specialized tool for analyzing page images to classify page types and extract page-specific information. ONLY use for: page type classification, document page analysis, page structure identification, page content categorization, and page-level document analysis. NOT for: content extraction, text transcription, diagrams, tables, or handwriting analysis. If no page type information is found, returns that no page content was detected and suggests checking with user for appropriate tool selection.

image_path.description: S3 URL (s3://bucket/key) or absolute file path to the image. Use this OR image_path, not both.

image_data.description: Base64-encoded image data. Use this OR image_path, not both. Preferred when image is already in memory.

aws_profile.description: Optional AWS profile name for Bedrock authentication. If not provided, uses default AWS credentials
